The question is the title. We’re a c++ team, and we finally got our On The Fly Paths working. The next step is to get the current heading of the robot and then use it to set the initial heading of the path. What’s the best way to go about this? Here’s our code for reference:

GitHub

#1259 Paradigm Shift

Pewaukee High School FIRST Robotics Competition team 1259, Paradigm Shift. - #1259 Paradigm Shift

(the repo is ThriftySled2024, not Reefscape2025 (confusing I know). The branch is Odometry).
